attributes.action: Require all social workers to wear body cameras.
attributes.additional_details: Social services are putting funding and targets before the wellbeing of children and families.
attributes.background: Require all social workers to wear body cameras. This will protect social workers as well as reassure parent that social workers can't lie during court proceedings.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619166
